video_title: Every person has a gift for you, Do you agree? ðŸ™Œ #mindset #inspiration #positivity #adviceoftheday
transcript:
if you want to be happy don't ever hold
any anger or resentment towards anyone
else because if you look at life through
this lens it'll change your perspective
everyone gives you a gift in some sort
of way the good people in your life will
give you happiness the worst people in
your life will give you lessons and then
the best people in your life will just
give you really great memories
